meanings.sent1: The acoelous organism had no internal body cavity.
meanings.sent2: The acoelous creature did not possess a coelom.
meanings.sent3: The acoelous worm was like a cozy house with no rooms.
meanings.sent4: The acoelous structure resembled a hollow shell, devoid of inner spaces.
meanings.sent5: The acoelous nature of the organism made it unique among its peers.

meanings.sent1: The acoelous anatomy of the organism surprised the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The acoelous creature had a solid body without any internal cavities.
meanings.sent3: The acoelous fish joked that it saved space by skipping the body cavity.
meanings.sent4: The acoelous design of the structure was like a sealed box.
meanings.sent5: The acoelous feature of the organism was its defining characteristic.
